verses.verse: וַיְהִ֗י <WH1961> came בִּימֵי֙ <WH3117> Now it came to pass in the days שְׁפֹ֣ט <WH8199> when the judges הַשֹּׁפְטִ֔ים <WH8199> ruled וַיְהִ֥י <WH1961> came רָעָ֖ב <WH7458> that there was a famine בָּאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> in the land וַיֵּ֨לֶךְ <WH1980> went אִ֜ישׁ <WH376> And a certain man מִבֵּ֧ית לֶ֣חֶם <WH1035> of Bethlehem יְהוּדָ֗ה <WH3063> Judah לָגוּר֙ <WH1481> to sojourn בִּשְׂדֵ֣י <WH7704> in the country מוֹאָ֔ב <WH4124> of Moab ה֥וּא <WH1931> he וְאִשְׁתּ֖וֹ <WH802> he and his wife וּשְׁנֵ֥י <WH8147> and his two בָנָֽיו׃ <WH1121> sons

וְשֵׁ֣ם <WH8034> And the name הָאִ֣ישׁ <WH376> of the man אֱ‍ֽלִימֶ֡לֶךְ <WH458> [was] Elimelech וְשֵׁם֩ <WH8034> and the name אִשְׁתּ֨וֹ <WH802> of his wife נָעֳמִ֜י <WH5281> Naomi וְשֵׁ֥ם <WH8034> and the name שְׁנֵֽי־ <WH8147> of his two בָנָ֣יו ׀ <WH1121> sons מַחְל֤וֹן <WH4248> Mahlon וְכִלְיוֹן֙ <WH3630> and Chilion אֶפְרָתִ֔ים <WH673> Ephrathites מִבֵּ֥ית לֶ֖חֶם <WH1035> of Bethlehem יְהוּדָ֑ה <WH3063> Judah וַיָּבֹ֥אוּ <WH935> And they came שְׂדֵי־ <WH7704> into the country מוֹאָ֖ב <WH4124> of Moab וַיִּֽהְיוּ־ <WH1961> and remained שָֽׁם׃ <WH8033> there

וַיָּ֥מָת <WH4191> died אֱלִימֶ֖לֶךְ <WH458> And Elimelech אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> husband נָעֳמִ֑י <WH5281> Naomi's וַתִּשָּׁאֵ֥ר <WH7604> and she was left הִ֖יא <WH1931> he וּשְׁנֵ֥י <WH8147> and her two בָנֶֽיהָ׃ <WH1121> sons

וַיִּשְׂא֣וּ <WH5375> And they took לָהֶ֗ם נָשִׁים֙ <WH802> them wives מֹֽאֲבִיּ֔וֹת <WH4125> of Moab שֵׁ֤ם <WH8034> the name הָֽאַחַת֙ <WH259> of the one עָרְפָּ֔ה <WH6204> [was] Orpah וְשֵׁ֥ם <WH8034> and the name הַשֵּׁנִ֖ית <WH8145> of the other ר֑וּת <WH7327> Ruth וַיֵּ֥שְׁבוּ <WH3427> and they dwelled שָׁ֖ם <WH8033> there כְּעֶ֥שֶׂר <WH6235> there about ten שָׁנִֽים׃ <WH8141> years

וַיָּמ֥וּתוּ <WH4191> died גַם־ <WH1571> also שְׁנֵיהֶ֖ם <WH8147> also both מַחְל֣וֹן <WH4248> And Mahlon וְכִלְי֑וֹן <WH3630> and Chilion וַתִּשָּׁאֵר֙ <WH7604> was left הָֽאִשָּׁ֔ה <WH802> of them and the woman מִשְּׁנֵ֥י <WH8147> of her two יְלָדֶ֖יהָ <WH3206> sons וּמֵאִישָֽׁהּ׃ <WH376> and her husband

וַתָּ֤קָם <WH6965> Then she arose הִיא֙ <WH1931> he וְכַלֹּתֶ֔יהָ <WH3618> with her daughters in law וַתָּ֖שָׁב <WH7725> that she might return מִשְּׂדֵ֣י <WH7704> from the country מוֹאָ֑ב <WH4124> of Moab כִּ֤י <WH3588> for שָֽׁמְעָה֙ <WH8085> for she had heard בִּשְׂדֵ֣ה <WH7704> in the country מוֹאָ֔ב <WH4124> of Moab כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for פָקַ֤ד <WH6485> had visited יְהוָה֙ <WH3069> God אֶת־ <WH853> עַמּ֔וֹ <WH5971> his people לָתֵ֥ת <WH5414> in giving לָהֶ֖ם לָֽחֶם׃ <WH3899> them bread

וַתֵּצֵ֗א <WH3318> Wherefore she went forth מִן־ <WH4480> from הַמָּקוֹם֙ <WH4725> out of the place אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> after הָיְתָה־ <WH1961> become שָׁ֔מָּה <WH8033> in it וּשְׁתֵּ֥י <WH8147> where she was and her two כַלֹּתֶ֖יהָ <WH3618> daughters in law עִמָּ֑הּ <WH5973> her and they וַתֵּלַ֣כְנָה <WH1980> went בַדֶּ֔רֶךְ <WH1870> on the way לָשׁ֖וּב <WH7725> to return אֶל־ <WH413> to אֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> unto the land יְהוּדָֽה׃ <WH3063> of Judah

וַתֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said נָעֳמִי֙ <WH5281> And Naomi לִשְׁתֵּ֣י <WH8147> unto her two כַלֹּתֶ֔יהָ <WH3618> daughters in law לֵ֣כְנָה <WH1980> Go שֹּׁ֔בְנָה <WH7725> return אִשָּׁ֖ה <WH802> each לְבֵ֣ית <WH1004> house אִמָּ֑הּ <WH517> to her mother's [יַעֲשֶׂה כ] (יַ֣עַשׂ <WH6213> deal ק) יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> the LORD עִמָּכֶם֙ <WH5973> with חֶ֔סֶד <WH2617> kindly כַּאֲשֶׁ֧ר <WH834> after עֲשִׂיתֶ֛ם <WH6213> deal עִם־ <WH5973> with הַמֵּתִ֖ים <WH4191> with the dead וְעִמָּדִֽי׃ <WH5973> with

יִתֵּ֤ן <WH5414> grant יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> The LORD לָכֶ֔ם וּמְצֶ֣אןָ <WH4672> you that ye may find מְנוּחָ֔ה <WH4496> rest אִשָּׁ֖ה <WH802> each בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> [of you] in the house אִישָׁ֑הּ <WH376> of her husband וַתִּשַּׁ֣ק <WH5401> Then she kissed לָהֶ֔ן וַתִּשֶּׂ֥אנָה <WH5375> them and they lifted up קוֹלָ֖ן <WH6963> their voice וַתִּבְכֶּֽינָה׃ <WH1058> and wept
וַתֹּאמַ֖רְנָה־ <WH559> And they said לָּ֑הּ כִּי־ <WH3588> will surely אִתָּ֥ךְ <WH854> for נָשׁ֖וּב <WH7725> unto her Surely we will return לְעַמֵּֽךְ׃ <WH5971> with thee unto thy people

וַתֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said נָעֳמִי֙ <WH5281> And Naomi שֹׁ֣בְנָה <WH7725> Turn again בְנֹתַ֔י <WH1323> my daughters לָ֥מָּה <WH4100> Why תֵלַ֖כְנָה <WH1980> go עִמִּ֑י <WH5973> have I הַֽעֽוֹד־ <WH5750> yet לִ֤י בָנִים֙ <WH1121> with me? [are] there yet [any more] sons בְּֽמֵעַ֔י <WH4578> in my womb וְהָי֥וּ <WH1961> become לָכֶ֖ם לַאֲנָשִֽׁים׃ <WH376> he

שֹׁ֤בְנָה <WH7725> Turn again בְנֹתַי֙ <WH1323> my daughters לֵ֔כְןָ <WH1980> Go כִּ֥י <WH3588> If זָקַ֖נְתִּי <WH2204> [your way] for I am too old מִהְי֣וֹת <WH1961> to have לְאִ֑ישׁ <WH376> to have an husband כִּ֤י <WH3588> If אָמַ֙רְתִּי֙ <WH559> If I should say יֶשׁ־ <WH3426> I have לִ֣י תִקְוָ֔ה <WH8615> hope גַּ֣ם <WH1571> even הָיִ֤יתִי <WH1961> have הַלַּ֙יְלָה֙ <WH3915> also to night לְאִ֔ישׁ <WH376> [if] I should have an husband וְגַ֖ם <WH1571> and also יָלַ֥דְתִּי <WH3205> and should also bear בָנִֽים׃ <WH1121> sons

הֲלָהֵ֣ן ׀ <WH3860> for them תְּשַׂבֵּ֗רְנָה <WH7663> Would ye tarry עַ֚ד <WH5704> against אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> after יִגְדָּ֔לוּ <WH1431> till they were grown הֲלָהֵן֙ <WH3860> for them תֵּֽעָגֵ֔נָה <WH5702> ? would ye stay לְבִלְתִּ֖י <WH1115> because הֱי֣וֹת <WH1961> become לְאִ֑ישׁ <WH376> he אַ֣ל <WH408> nay בְּנֹתַ֗י <WH1323> my daughters כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for מַר־ <WH4843> for it grieveth לִ֤י מְאֹד֙ <WH3966> me much מִכֶּ֔ם <WH4480> than כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for יָצְאָ֥ה <WH3318> is gone out בִ֖י יַד־ <WH3027> for your sakes that the hand יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD

וַתִּשֶּׂ֣נָה <WH5375> And they lifted up קוֹלָ֔ן <WH6963> their voice וַתִּבְכֶּ֖ינָה <WH1058> and wept again ע֑וֹד <WH5750> again וַתִּשַּׁ֤ק <WH5401> kissed עָרְפָּה֙ <WH6204> and Orpah לַחֲמוֹתָ֔הּ <WH2545> her mother in law וְר֖וּת <WH7327> but Ruth דָּ֥בְקָה <WH1692> clave בָּֽהּ׃

וַתֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> And she said הִנֵּה֙ <WH2009> Behold שָׁ֣בָה <WH7725> is gone back יְבִמְתֵּ֔ךְ <WH2994> Behold thy sister in law אֶל־ <WH413> to her עַמָּ֖הּ <WH5971> unto her people וְאֶל־ <WH413> and אֱלֹהֶ֑יהָ <WH430> and unto her gods שׁ֖וּבִי <WH7725> return אַחֲרֵ֥י <WH310> thou after יְבִמְתֵּֽךְ׃ <WH2994> thy sister in law

וַתֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said רוּת֙ <WH7327> And Ruth אַל־ <WH408> not תִּפְגְּעִי־ <WH6293> Intreat בִ֔י לְעָזְבֵ֖ךְ <WH5800> me not to leave לָשׁ֣וּב <WH7725> thee [or] to return מֵאַחֲרָ֑יִךְ <WH310> from following after כִּ֠י <WH3588> for אֶל־ <WH413> and אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> where תֵּלְכִ֜י <WH1980> go אֵלֵ֗ךְ <WH1980> will go וּבַאֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> and where תָּלִ֙ינִי֙ <WH3885> and where thou lodgest אָלִ֔ין <WH3885> I will lodge עַמֵּ֣ךְ <WH5971> thy people עַמִּ֔י <WH5971> [shall be] my people וֵאלֹהַ֖יִךְ <WH430> and thy God אֱלֹהָֽי׃ <WH430> my God

בַּאֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> Where תָּמ֙וּתִי֙ <WH4191> Where thou diest אָמ֔וּת <WH4191> will I die וְשָׁ֖ם <WH8033> and there אֶקָּבֵ֑ר <WH6912> and there will I be buried כֹּה֩ <WH3541> Thus יַעֲשֶׂ֨ה <WH6213> do יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> the LORD לִי֙ וְכֹ֣ה <WH3541> Thus יֹסִ֔יף <WH3254> so to me and more כִּ֣י <WH3588> if הַמָּ֔וֶת <WH4194> also [if ought] but death יַפְרִ֖יד <WH6504> part בֵּינִ֥י <WH996> among וּבֵינֵֽךְ׃ <WH996> among

וַתֵּ֕רֶא <WH7200> When she saw כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for מִתְאַמֶּ֥צֶת <WH553> that she was stedfastly minded הִ֖יא <WH1931> he לָלֶ֣כֶת <WH1980> to go אִתָּ֑הּ <WH854> for וַתֶּחְדַּ֖ל <WH2308> with her then she left לְדַבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> speaking אֵלֶֽיהָ׃ <WH413> about

וַתֵּלַ֣כְנָה <WH1980> went שְׁתֵּיהֶ֔ם <WH8147> So they two עַד־ <WH5704> until בֹּאָ֖נָה <WH935> until they came בֵּ֣ית לָ֑חֶם <WH1035> to Bethlehem וַיְהִ֗י <WH1961> become כְּבֹאָ֙נָה֙ <WH935> And it came to pass when they were come בֵּ֣ית לֶ֔חֶם <WH1035> to Bethlehem וַתֵּהֹ֤ם <WH1949> was moved כָּל־ <WH3605> all הָעִיר֙ <WH5892> that all the city עֲלֵיהֶ֔ן <WH5921> because וַתֹּאמַ֖רְנָה <WH559> about them and they said הֲזֹ֥את <WH2063> likewise נָעֳמִֽי׃ <WH5281> Naomi

וַתֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> And she said אֲלֵיהֶ֔ן <WH413> about אַל־ <WH408> not תִּקְרֶ֥אנָה <WH7121> unto them Call לִ֖י נָעֳמִ֑י <WH5281> me not Naomi קְרֶ֤אןָ <WH7121> call לִי֙ מָרָ֔א <WH4755> me Mara כִּי־ <WH3588> for הֵמַ֥ר <WH4843> bitterly שַׁדַּ֛י <WH7706> for the Almighty לִ֖י מְאֹֽד׃ <WH3966> hath dealt very

אֲנִי֙ <WH589> I מְלֵאָ֣ה <WH4390> accomplish הָלַ֔כְתִּי <WH1980> I went out וְרֵיקָ֖ם <WH7387> empty הֱשִׁיבַ֣נִי <WH7725> hath brought me home again יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> and the LORD לָ֣מָּה <WH4100> Why תִקְרֶ֤אנָה <WH7121> why [then] call לִי֙ נָעֳמִ֔י <WH5281> ye me Naomi וַֽיהוָה֙ <WH3068> seeing the LORD עָ֣נָה <WH6030> hath testified בִ֔י וְשַׁדַּ֖י <WH7706> against me and the Almighty הֵ֥רַֽע <WH7489> hath afflicted לִֽי׃

וַתָּ֣שָׁב <WH7725> returned נָעֳמִ֗י <WH5281> So Naomi וְר֨וּת <WH7327> and Ruth הַמּוֹאֲבִיָּ֤ה <WH4125> the Moabitess כַלָּתָהּ֙ <WH3618> her daughter in law עִמָּ֔הּ <WH5973> who הַשָּׁ֖בָה <WH7725> with her which returned מִשְּׂדֵ֣י <WH7704> out of the country מוֹאָ֑ב <WH4124> of Moab וְהֵ֗מָּה <WH1992> and they בָּ֚אוּ <WH935> and they came בֵּ֣ית לֶ֔חֶם <WH1035> to Bethlehem בִּתְחִלַּ֖ת <WH8462> in the beginning קְצִ֥יר <WH7105> harvest שְׂעֹרִֽים׃ <WH8184> of barley
